jobDescription: Data Analyst - HIV Screening Location  Beaumont, TX Job Code 3390 # of openings 1Apply NowPosition Summary: The primary responsibilities are to manage and analyze data to meet the tracking, surveillance, evaluation, and reporting objectives of Baptist Hospitals of Southeast Texas Preventative Screening Program. The Data Analyst will perform data analysis, prepare descriptive reports, provide data support, and technical assistance to the Preventative Screening staff, will fullfill internal and external data requests. Fully funded by grants. Minimum Experience: Minimum 2 years supporting IT in healthcare environment; 2+ years supporting client server and mainframe applications. Minimum Education: 4 year degree in computer related major or 2 year degree with 2+ years experience in support of IT applications. Required Certification/License: Experience in the use of statistical software for data analysis.
